name: Arkanoid Remake (keybasket)
description:
This is a remake for the 1980 Arknanoid game for the NES, made by Raúl Fernández Guardia & Ramón Arjona Quiñones. All sprites rights reserved to Taito.

Even though it's a very similar game, this game features:

- Original menu music (it's a retro mashup worth listening)

- Original and really fun 2Player Mode. Now you can cooperate with your friends to beat the levels you never could beat

- This game includes 12 levels, 11 from the original game and 1 extra made by us
